resources.string:
Java Trivia Application will help remind you of important concepts you have learned and will learn in java programming.

Consider modifying the questions and graphics to make this game your own! 
 
 This app is created using kotlin in android studio.

Select the answer from the options given. Each time you get an answer correct, you advance to the next question.\n\nIf you get the answer wrong, your game ends! You can return to the title screen using up or back from within the game screen, and this will also end your game.
I mastered #JAVATRIVIA with %1$d/%2$d correct questions! created By Gaurav Singh Bora
